function_description: Create a new board using the '+Add Board' button at the top-right corner.
initial_state: User is on the main project page within the 4ga Boards app, with at least one project already created.
steps: Locate the '+Add Board' button at the top-right corner of the screen.
In the pop-up window that appears, enter a name for the new board in the textbox provided.
Optionally, select a template from the dropdown menu or import existing data using the provided options.
Click the 'Add Board' button to create the board.
expected_state: A new board is created and displayed under the current project, with the specified name and selected template or imported data applied.
